text: "A Blitz of Salt-N-Pepa Hits: The Hits Remixed" is the first compilation album by American hip hop trio Salt-n-Pepa. It includes re-mixed versions of songs taken from their three studio albums, Hot, Cool & Vicious, A Salt with a Deadly Pepa and Blacks' Magic.The album was certified platinum in Canada. ==Review== Stephen Thomas Erlewine of AllMusic gave the album 2 out of 5, saying: "As remix albums go, Salt-N-Pepa's is fine, but their hit singles lose a bit of their magic in these extended forms." == Track listing == ==Chart positions== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Chart !Position |- |rowspan=3|1990 |US R&B; album chart |63 |- |Canadian RPM (magazine) album chart |23 |- |British OCC album chart |70 |- |} ==Credits== * Mastered at The Hit Factory * Mastered by Herb Powers Jr. ==References== Category:1990 remix albums Category:Salt-N-Pepa albums
